---
title: Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0
sidebar_label: Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0

translations.zh-CN: # Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0

segments.source_content: The following guide will walk you through the process of configuring SAML Jackson to use the Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0 directory provider.

translations.zh-CN: 本指南将引导您完成配置SAML Jackson以使用Microsoft Entra ID SCIM v2.0目录提供商的流程。

segments.source_content: ### Create Azure Application

translations.zh-CN: ### 创建Azure应用

segments.source_content: Click **Azure Active Directory** from the Microsoft Azure Portal.

translations.zh-CN: 在Microsoft Azure门户中点击**Azure Active Directory**。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/1.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/1.png)

segments.source_content: Click **Enterprise Applications** from the left navigation menu.

translations.zh-CN: 从左导航菜单点击**企业应用程序**。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/2.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤2](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/2.png)

segments.source_content: If your application is already created, choose it from the list and move to the section [Enable SCIM Provisioning](#enable-azure-scim-provisioning)

translations.zh-CN: 如果应用已创建，从列表中选择并跳转至章节[启用SCIM配置](#enable-azure-scim-provisioning)

segments.source_content: If you haven't created your application yet, click **New application** button.

translations.zh-CN: 若尚未创建应用，点击**新建应用程序**按钮。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 2.1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/2_1.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤2.1](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/2_1.png)

segments.source_content: From the next screen, click **Create your own application**, give your application a **name** and click the **Create** button.

translations.zh-CN: 在下一界面点击**创建自己的应用**，输入应用**名称**后点击**创建**按钮。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/3.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤3](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/3.png)

segments.source_content: ### Enable Azure SCIM Provisioning

translations.zh-CN: ### 启用Azure SCIM配置

segments.source_content: Click **Provisioning** from the left navigation menu then click **Get started**.

translations.zh-CN: 从左导航菜单点击**配置**，然后点击**开始使用**。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/4.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤4](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/4.png)

segments.source_content: Select **Automatic** from the **Provisioning Mode** dropdown and enter the following information under **Admin Credentials** section:

translations.zh-CN: 在**配置模式**下拉框选择**自动**，并在**管理员凭据**部分输入以下信息：

segments.source_content:
- Tenant URL
- Secret Token

translations.zh-CN:
- 租户URL
- 密钥令牌

segments.source_content: Next, click the **Test Connection** button to test the connection to see if the credentials are correct, then click **Save** to save the credentials.

translations.zh-CN: 点击**测试连接**按钮验证凭据是否正确，点击**保存**存储凭据。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/5.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤5](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/5.png)

segments.source_content: Expand the **Mappings** section and ensure group and user attribute mappings are enabled for your app. The default mapping should work.

translations.zh-CN: 展开**映射**部分，确保为应用启用了用户和组的属性映射。默认映射应可正常工作。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/6.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤6](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/6.png)

segments.source_content: Expand the **Settings** section and make the following changes:

translations.zh-CN: 展开**设置**部分并进行以下调整：

segments.source_content:
- Select **Sync only assigned users and groups** from the **Scope** dropdown.
- Confirm the **Provisioning Status** is set to **On**.

translations.zh-CN:
- 在**范围**下拉框选择**仅同步分配的用户和组**
- 确认**配置状态**设为**开启**

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 7](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/7.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤7](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/7.png)

segments.source_content: At this stage, you've successfully configured the Microsoft Entra ID SCIM API integration.

translations.zh-CN: 至此您已成功完成Microsoft Entra ID SCIM API集成配置。

segments.source_content: ### Assign Users

translations.zh-CN: ### 分配用户

segments.source_content: From your application, click the **Users and groups** from the left navigation menu and click **Add user/group**.

translations.zh-CN: 在应用中点击左导航菜单的**用户和组**，点击**添加用户/组**。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 8](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/8.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤8](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/8.png)

segments.source_content: Select **None Selected** under the **Users**.

translations.zh-CN: 在**用户**下方选择**未选择**。

segments.source_content: From the right side of the screen, select the users you want to assign to the app and click the **Select** button, then click **Assign** to those users to the app.

translations.zh-CN: 在界面右侧选择需分配至应用的用户，点击**选择**按钮后点击**分配**完成用户关联。

segments.source_content: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM Step 9](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/9.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 步骤9](/images/docs/jackson/dsync-providers/azure/9.png)

segments.source_content: ### FAQ

translations.zh-CN: ### 常见问题

segments.source_content: #### How frequently does Microsoft Entra ID SCIM perform sync by default?

translations.zh-CN: #### Microsoft Entra ID SCIM默认同步频率是多少？

segments.source_content: Microsoft Entra ID automatically provisions and updates user accounts in an app based on things like user and group assignment. The sync happens at a regularly scheduled time interval, typically every 20-40 minutes.

translations.zh-CN: Microsoft Entra ID 会根据用户和组分配等情况，自动在应用程序中配置和更新用户账户。同步操作按固定时间间隔进行，通常每20-40分钟执行一次。

segments.source_content: #### Why does the PATCH request fail in Microsoft Entra ID SCIM?

translations.zh-CN: #### 为什么 Microsoft Entra ID SCIM 中的 PATCH 请求会失败？

segments.source_content: This is a known issue with Entra ID SCIM implementation. You have to add the query param `?aadOptscim062020` to the SCIM endpoint URL to make PATCH requests work. This query param update PATCH behavior and ensure SCIM compliance. [Read More](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/app-provisioning/application-provisioning-config-problem-scim-compatibility#flags-to-alter-the-scim-behavior)

translations.zh-CN: 这是 Entra ID SCIM 实现的一个已知问题。您需要在 SCIM 端点 URL 中添加查询参数 `?aadOptscim062020` 才能使 PATCH 请求正常工作。该查询参数会更新 PATCH 行为并确保 SCIM 合规性。[了解更多](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/app-provisioning/application-provisioning-config-problem-scim-compatibility#flags-to-alter-the-scim-behavior)
